feed.title: UW-Whitewater Current Status
feed.subtitle: In the event of an emergency, this feed will be updated with information about the nature of the incident, how to remain safe and, after the event, the point at which safety has been restored.
feed.rights: Copyright 2008 University of Wisconsin System Board of Regents

entry.title: Current Status: No Emergency
entry.content: There is no emergency at the University of Wisconsin-Whitewater. The campus is operating under normal conditions.
